I’m a web analytics expert skilled in optimizing digital marketing efforts for businesses of all sizes. Whether you need to set up tracking, analyze data, or improve conversions, I’ve got you covered.

Experience

Certified google analytics 4 (GA4).

I have extensive experience with Google Analytics 4 (GA4), including setting up event tracking, creating custom reports, and integrating tools for actionable insights. I use GA4's user-focused tracking and predictive insights to improve data-driven strategies and drive business success.

Adobe Analytics (AA)

I have strong experience with Adobe Analytics, where I have implemented robust tracking solutions, created custom reports, and conducted in-depth data analysis to inform business strategies. My work involves leveraging Adobe’s advanced segmentation and reporting tools to provide actionable insights, enhance user experience, and support data-driven decision-making.

social media tracking tools

I have strong experience with Facebook Pixel, TikTok Pixel, Snap Pixel, and Pinterest Tag, implementing and managing them to track user interactions, measure conversions, and optimize ad strategies for improved campaign performance and ROI.

Java Script , HTML , CSS

As a web analyst, my proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS serves as valuable supporting skills. These technical abilities enable me to implement and troubleshoot custom tracking codes, optimize data collection methods, and ensure accurate integration of analytics tools across websites. This technical foundation enhances my ability to collaborate effectively with development teams and maintain robust, data-driven insights.

Interests

One of my greatest passions outside of my professional life is cooking. I find joy in exploring different culinary traditions and experimenting with new recipes from around the world. Whether it's perfecting classic dishes, creating fusion cuisine, or trying out unique flavor combinations, I love the creative process that comes with preparing meals. .

Cooking not only allows me to express my creativity but also brings a sense of relaxation and fulfillment. I enjoy sharing my culinary creations with friends and family, turning every meal into an opportunity for connection and joy. From baking artisan bread to crafting intricate dishes, the kitchen is my playground where I continue to learn and refine my skills.
